content.query:
SELECT * FROM sys.dm_external_data_processed



select 

login_name,

(substring(convert(varchar(10), start_time,103), 4, 10)) Data, 

sum(data_processed_mb) sum_data_processed_mb

from sys.dm_exec_requests_history 

group by login_name, (substring(convert(varchar(10), start_time,103), 4, 10))
